lines.text: The vault... I tried to warn you... those creatures... the vault... I tried... All my work! Thirty years, I have tried to prevent this from happening.

[Amy, Daphne, and Kyle are "fighting" the hobgoblins]
Must be a new dance... pretty kinky.
Must have been a rowdy crowd tonight.

[as everyone is making out and Mr. McCreedy hangs up the phone]
Uh... excuse me sir, can I use your phone?
[repeated line]

[to McCreedy]
You're not as young as you used to be!

[McCreedy is going to search for Kevin]
I will not have you abandoning your job to go chase some foolishness! If you walk off this lot, you are FIRED!
Well, good! Saves me the trouble of quitting.
[first lines]

[Dennis is listening to his radio]
Dennis. Dennis!
[takes off his headphones]
Hey! What gives?
You're being paid to work around here, not just sit around and blast your eardrums!
Hey, take it easy. I can do both.
[smiles]

[a phone rings, McCreedy answers]
Hello? Hello?
[hangs up]

[to Dennis]
Didn't you hear the phone ringing?
No, I didn't.
They've already hung up!
Then, it couldn't have been too important.
Don't you have any sense of responsibility? That could have been a very important call!
At this hour?
Look, in the future, would you just answer the phone no matter what hour it is and not to make decisions about what is important and what isn't?
Yeah, yeah, right, right.
It's time for our rounds.

[McCreedy and Dennis are roaming around inside the lot]
Did I ever tell you about what this studio lot was like?
More than once.

[smiles]
Oh, this used to be one of the biggest lots in town!
Must have been a wild ride to Metropolis.
[both chuckle]

[They approach a room]
Hey, wait a minute. What's this down there?
Oh, it's just an old film vault. There's nothing down there.
Well, why don't we check it out anyways?
I'm telling you there's nothing down there and I'm not going to waste my time checking it out!

[Through the walkie-talkie]
McCreedy!

[to Comstock]
What is it now?
I need to talk to you now.
But I can't right now!
NOW! I mean it!
I'll be right back. Oh, and remember what I said about the vault.

[putting on headphones]
Whatever you say, pops.
